bio:
I work towards delivering unique services and personal attention to your project. Unlike other companies who pass you on to lesser experienced writers, I prefer taking on a client or two at a time and work closely with them. I’ll also be available at anytime in case you need to reach me.

My client list boasts of New York Times bestselling authors, publishing houses, prominent public figures, successful business owners, and different people that have experiences worth sharing.

I have worked with entrepreneurs from various industries, professionals from various fields, CEO’s of multiple companies, mothers, Congressmen, and more. My bachelor’s degree is in psychology and I have been a professional writer for over 15 years. I’ve been happily married for 12 years and have four amazing kids. We reside in Florida just outside of Orlando. I am passionate about writing and the idea of creating content is something I look forward to each day. I also enjoy playing the piano, painting and reading.
All projects must be funded in Guru Safepay before beginning any work.

abstrac: Dynamic, Detailed, Expressive Comic book /Graphic Novel Art & Illustrations as close as to your imagination realized with my skill.
bio: I have been drawing comics, worked in Advertising agencies, practiced paintings. I enjoy providing specialized, customized service in areas of * Comic book art, Pencil, Ink/Color  (Digital and traditional) * Children Book Illustration, * T-Shirt Illustration, * Novel and Magazine Cover designs, * Commercial art  and Storyboard art. Often the employers I worked with are accomplished writers.Working closely with the employer, I try to realize his vision to his complete satisfaction. I bid only for the projects I find special. I accept work which inspires me to be at my best because my inspiration is the key to the satisfaction of the viewer.Communication lines are always open. I enjoy making changes and adjusting my visuals. I express my thoughts freely and suggest if required.  It is a real joy to work in this secured Guru environment for the past seven years.

I prefer to work closely with the employer, communicating regularly through email. Prompt responses save time. I search on my own for references and information needed for the project but whatever is provided by the employer is most welcome since that would set a standard of his requirements. I will provide Thumbnails and changes are welcome in the preliminary stages. My challenge is to make it as you imagined.  I believe that you hire me to realize your vision rather than buying my version of your vision. If that is your need I can enjoy the freedom and go wild too. In short, my output depends on your need.

bio:
I am a Mechanical Engineer and 3D modeling expert. With more than 7 years of professional experience supports me to stand out with the following skillset 
• Product Design (Design, Rendering, 3D printing, Prototyping, Manufacturing) 
• CAD Modelling (SOLIDWORKS, Autodesk Inventor, Creo, Pro E, AutoCAD) 
• Fabrication drawings, Detail drawings for bulk manufacturing follow ISO and ANSI standard
• FEA Analysis (Solidworks) 
• Material Selection
I am well experienced in the complete design process starting from concept sketches to bulk manufacturing. 
I am accustomed to the use of standard components from reliable suppliers e.g. Macmaster-Carr, Misumi to keep the product cost at a minimum. 
I have 7 years of experience in CAD modelling using Solidworks, AutoCAD, Autodesk Inventor and Creo/ProE Software.
I have modeled products for clients for 3d printing, make prototype and manufacturing purposes. 
Apart from that, I have also worked on complex assemblies including Trailer, Concrete Hopper, Steel Structure, etc. 
I invite you to visit my portfolio and I look forward to working with you. 
Regards
Viet Cao

bio:
I provide editing and writing services including developmental and structural editing, line editing, substantive editing, manuscript evaluations, and beta reads.

With over a decade of fiction editing experience, I understand the elements that build a great story. My edits resolve weaknesses on the book, chapter, and sentence level to ensure your writing is clear, consistent, and compelling while retaining your own unique style and voice.

I help authors to strengthen and refine their writing by addressing issues including: 

Characterization
Plot, Conflict, and Suspense
Pacing
Showing versus Telling
Point of View
Setting
Dialogue
Structure
World Building
Style and Flow

My edits include explanations for different types of recommended revisions, making it easier for authors to improve their future writing.

I have a BA in English with a concentration in Writing. I am a member of the Editorial Freelancers Association and an award-winning independently published author.
I prefer fixed-price projects using Safe Pay. Rates are per word based on the level of editing needed.
